sentence.Network_en: Did it resemble the earth when this was destitute of an atmosphere?
sentence.Network_cn: 它同地球上还没有大气的时候一样 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: The pattern so obtained will not resemble any of the others.
sentence.Network_cn: 所得到的这个图样将不同于其他各种特征图样.

sentence.Network_en: His nails resemble the ivory keys of the spinet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的指甲象白色的琴键一样.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... dissemble v 假装，掩饰 resemble v 类似， 像…一样 resemblan n 类似.
21世纪大学英语读写教程单词表(一) - 豆丁网 ... faintly ad. 微弱地，轻微地 resemble vt. 类似，像 drum n. 鼓.
新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... research 研究，调查 resemble 像，类似于 response 回答，答复；反应，响应.
新编大学英语单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... rainfall n. 一场雨 resemble v. 相像 resolution n. 决定.

list.abs: 用原型理论和家族相似性 (family resemblance) 理论对自然语义进行分解和表述 ; 国内也有一些论著和文章谈到原型理论 , necessary.
accidental relations 偶然关系accidental resemblance 偶同accidental sameness 偶然的同一
coefficient of variation 变异系数coefficient resemblance 类似系数coefficient variation 系数变量
similar to or resembling a leaf ., 与叶相似的或象叶子的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French resembler, based on Latin similare (from similis 'like')

entry.def: If one thing or person resembles another, they are similar to each other.

example.ex: Some of the commercially produced venison resembles beef in flavour...
example.tran: 有些商业化养殖的鹿肉味道和牛肉很相似。

means.word_mean: 1. appear like; be similar or bear a likeness to;

auth_sentence.content: The operation came to eerily resemble the Trujillo conspiracy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The operation came to eerily resemble the Trujillo conspiracy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The operation came to eerily resemble the Trujillo conspiracy.

auth_sentence.content: Pulse until the mixture begins to resemble fine breadcrumbs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pulse until the mixture begins to resemble fine breadcrumbs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pulse until the mixture begins to resemble fine breadcrumbs.

auth_sentence.content: These delightful early showpieces more closely resemble courtly dances.
auth_sentence.res_content: These delightful early showpieces more closely resemble courtly dances.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These delightful early showpieces more closely resemble courtly dances.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 集合, 装配, 集会, 集结, 汇编
stems_affixes.word_buile: assemble[v.集合,召集;装配;收集 v.集合,聚集]+y状态,性质→assembly
resemble[v.像,类似]+ance表名词→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
sembl相类似,一样+ance表名词→相同之处
as不断+sembl相类似,一样+e→不断[走向]同一个地方→召集
dis不+sembl相类似,一样+e→不想同装做相同→掩饰
re再,加强+sembl相类似,一样+e→v.像,类似

Sentence.sentence: As American research universities begin to resemble profit centers and entertainment complexes, it's easy to lose sight of their primary mission; to produce and spread knowledge.

sentences.en: My brother resembles me in looks.

jushi.english: My brother resembles me in looks.
